Package jsymbolic2.features

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcousticGuitarFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to acoustic guitar patches (General MIDI patches 25 to 26).
    AcousticGuitarFractionFeatureTest
    Created by dinamix on 5/6/16.
    AmountOfArpeggiationFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the fraction of horizontal intervals that are repeated notes, minor thirds, major thirds, perfect fifths, minor sevenths, major sevenths, octaves, minor tenths or major tenths.
    AverageMelodicIntervalFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average melodic interval in semi-tones.
    AverageNoteDurationFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average duration of notes in seconds.
    AverageNoteToNoteDynamicsChangeFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average change of loudness from one note to the next note in the same channel (in MIDI velocity units).
    AverageNumberOfIndependentVoicesFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average number of different channels in which notes have sounded simultaneously.
    AverageRangeOfGlissandosFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average range of Pitch Bends, where range is defined as the greatest value of the absolute difference between 64 and the second data byte of all MIDI Pitch Bend messages falling between the Note On and Note Off messages of any note.
    AverageTimeBetweenAttacksFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average time in seconds between Note On events (irregardless of channel).
    AverageTimeBetweenAttacksForEachVoiceFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average fo average times in seconds between Note On events on individual channels that contain at least one note.
    AverageVariabilityOfTimeBetweenAttacksForEachVoiceFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the average standard deviation, in seconds, of time between Note On events on individual channels that contain at least one note.
    BasicPitchHistogramFeature
    A feature exractor that finds a features array with bins corresponding to the values of the basic pitch histogram.
    BeatHistogramFeature
    A feature exractor that finds a feature array with entries corresponding to the frequency values of each of the bins of the beat histogram (except the first 40 empty ones).
    BrassFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to brass patches (General MIDI patches 57 or 68).
    ChangesOfMeterFeature
    A feature exractor that sets the feature to 1 if the time signature is changed one or more times during the recording.
    ChromaticMotionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals corresponding to a semi-tone.
    CombinedStrengthOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the sum of the frequencies of the two beat bins of the peaks with the highest frequencies.
    CompoundOrSimpleMeterFeature
    A feature exractor that sets tehe feature to 1 if the initial meter is compound (numerator of time signature is greater than or equal to 6 and is evenly divisible by 3) and to 0 if it is simple (if the above condition is not fulfilled).
    DirectionOfMotionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are rising rather than falling.
    DistanceBetweenMostCommonMelodicIntervalsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the absolute value of the difference between the most common melodic interval and the second most common melodic interval.
    DominantSpreadFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the largest number of consecutive pitch classes separated by perfect 5ths that accounted for at least 9% each of the notes.
    DurationFeature
    A feature exractor that extracts the duration in seconds of a MIDI sequence.
    DurationOfMelodicArcsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average number of notes that separate melodic peaks and troughs in any channel.
    ElectricGuitarFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average number of notes that separate melodic peaks and troughs in any channel.
    ElectricInstrumentFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to electric instrument patches (General MIDI patches 5, 6, 17, 19, 27 to 32 or 34 to 40).
    FifthsPitchHistogramFeature
    A feature exractor that finds a feature array with bins corresponding to the values of the 5ths pitch class histogram.
    GlissandoPrevalenceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of Note Ons that have at least one MIDI Pitch Bend associated with them divided by total number of pitched Note Ons.
    HarmonicityOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the bin label of the higher (in terms of bin label) of the two beat bins of the peaks with the highest frequency divided by the bin label of the lower.
    ImportanceOfBassRegisterFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of Note Ons between MIDI pitches 0 and 54.
    ImportanceOfHighRegisterFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of Note Ons between MIDI pitches 73 and 127.
    ImportanceOfLoudestVoiceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the difference between the average loudness of the loudest channel and the average loudness of the other channels that contain at least one note.
    ImportanceOfMiddleRegisterFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of Note Ons between MIDI pitches 55 and 72.
    InitialTempoFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the Tempo in beats per minute at the start of the recording.
    InitialTimeSignatureFeature
    A feature exractor that finds a feature array with two elements.
    IntervalBetweenStrongestPitchClassesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the absolute value of the difference between the pitch classes of the two most common MIDI pitch classes.
    IntervalBetweenStrongestPitchesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the Absolute value of the difference between the pitches of the two most common MIDI pitches.
    MaximumNoteDurationFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the duration of the longest note (in seconds).
    MaximumNumberOfIndependentVoicesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the maximum number of different channels in which notes have sounded simultaneously.
    MEIFeatureExtractor
    The prototype for feature extractors.
    MelodicFifthsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the maximum number of different channels in which notes have sounded simultaneously.
    MelodicIntervalHistogramFeature
    A feature exractor that finds a features array with bins corresponding to the values of the melodic interval histogram.
    MelodicIntervalsInLowestLineFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average melodic interval in semitones of the channel with the lowest average pitch divided by the average melodic interval of all channels that contain at least two notes.
    MelodicOctavesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are octaves.
    MelodicThirdsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are thirds.
    MelodicTritonesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that are tritones.
    MIDIFeatureExtractor
    The prototype for feature extractors.
    MinimumNoteDurationFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the duration of the shortest note (in seconds).
    MostCommonMelodicIntervalFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the duration of the shortest note (in seconds).
    MostCommonMelodicIntervalPrevalenceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that belong to the most common interval.
    MostCommonPitchClassFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the bin label of the most common pitch class.
    MostCommonPitchClassPrevalenceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of Note Ons corresponding to the most common pitch class.
    MostCommonPitchFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the bin label of the most common pitch divided by the number of possible pitches.
    MostCommonPitchPrevalenceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of Note Ons corresponding to the most common pitch.
    NoteDensityFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average number of notes per second.
    NotePrevalenceOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of (pitched) notes played by each General MIDI Instrument.
    NotePrevalenceOfUnpitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of (unpitched) notes played by each General MIDI Percussion Key Map Instrument.
    NumberOfCommonMelodicIntervalsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of melodic intervals that represent at least 9% of all melodic intervals.
    NumberOfCommonPitchesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of pitches that account individually for at least 9% of all notes.
    NumberOfGraceNotesFeature
    Obtain all of the grace notes of a particular MEI piece through the MeiSpecificStorage class from the See jMei2Midi dependency software.
    NumberOfModeratePulsesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the Number of beat peaks with normalized frequencies over 0.01.
    NumberOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the total number of General MIDI patches that are used to play at least one note.
    NumberOfRelativelyStrongPulsesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of beat peaks with frequencies at least 30% as high as the frequency of the bin with the highest frequency.
    NumberOfStrongPulsesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of beat peaks with normalized frequencies over 0.1.
    NumberOfUnpitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of distinct MIDI Percussion Key Map patches that were used to play at least one note.
    OrchestralStringsFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to orchestral strings patches (General MIDI patches 41 or 47).
    OverallDynamicRangeFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the maximum loudness minus the minimum loudness value.
    PercussionPrevalenceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the total number of Note Ons corresponding to unpitched percussion instruments divided by total number of Note Ons in the recording.
    PitchClassDistributionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds a feature array with 12 entries where the first holds the frequency of the bin of the pitch class histogram with the highest frequency, and the following entries holding the successive bins of the histogram, wrapping around if necessary.
    PitchClassVarietyFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the total number of pitch classes used at least once.
    PitchedInstrumentsPresentFeature
    A feature exractor that finds which pitched General MIDI Instruments are present.
    PitchVarietyFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the total number of pitches used at least once.
    PolyrhythmsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of beat peaks with frequencies at least 30% of the highest frequency whose bin labels are not integer multiples or factors (using only multipliers of 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8) (with an accepted error of +/- 3 bins) of the bin label of the peak with the highest frequency.
    PrimaryRegisterFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average MIDI pitch.
    QualityFeature
    A feature exractor that sets the feature to 0 if the key signature indicates that a recording is major, set to 1 if it indicates that it is minor and set to 0 if key signature is unknown.
    QuintupleMeterFeature
    A feature exractor that sets the feature to 1 if numerator of initial time signature is 5, set to 0 otherwise.
    RangeFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the difference between highest and lowest pitches.
    RangeOfHighestLineFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the difference between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average pitch divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note in the piece.
    RelativeNoteDensityOfHighestLineFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of Note Ons in the channel with the highest average pitch divided by the average number of Note Ons in all channels that contain at least one note.
    RelativeRangeOfLoudestVoiceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the difference between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average loudness divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note overall in the piece.
    RelativeStrengthOfMostCommonIntervalsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that belong to the second most common interval divided by the fraction of melodic intervals belonging to the most common interval.
    RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchClassesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the frequency of the 2nd most common pitch class divided by the frequency of the most common pitch class.
    RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the frequency of the 2nd most common pitch divided by the frequency of the most common pitch.
    RepeatedNotesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of notes that are repeated melodically.
    RhythmicLoosenessFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average width of beat histogram peaks (in beats per minute).
    RhythmicVariabilityFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the bin values (except the first 40 empty ones).
    SaxophoneFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to saxophone patches (General MIDI patches 65 or 68).
    SecondStrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the bin label of the beat bin of the peak with the second highest frequency.
    SizeOfMelodicArcsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average melodic interval separating the top note of melodic peaks and the bottom note of melodic troughs.
    StaccatoIncidenceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of notes with durations of less than a 10th of a second divided by the total number of notes in the recording.
    StepwiseMotionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that corresponded to a minor or major third.
    StrengthOfSecondStrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the frequency of the beat bin of the peak with the second highest frequency.
    StrengthOfStrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the frequency of the beat bin with the highest frequency.
    StrengthRatioOfTwoStrongestRhythmicPulsesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the frequency of the higher (in terms of frequency) of the two beat bins corresponding to the peaks with the highest frequency divided by the frequency of the lower.
    StringEnsembleFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to string ensemble patches (General MIDI patches 49 to 52).
    StringKeyboardFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to string keyboard patches (General MIDI patches 1 to 8).
    StrongestRhythmicPulseFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the bin label of the beat bin with the highest frequency.
    StrongTonalCentresFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of peaks in the fifths pitch histogram that each account for at least 9% of all Note Ons.
    TimePrevalenceOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of the total time of the recording in which a note was sounding for each (pitched) General MIDI Instrument.
    TripleMeterFeature
    A feature exractor that is set to 1 if numerator of initial time signature is 3 and set to 0 otherwise.
    UnpitchedInstrumentsPresentFeature
    A feature exractor that finds which unpitched MIDI Percussion Key Map instruments are present.
    VariabilityOfNoteDurationFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of note durations in seconds.
    VariabilityOfNotePrevalenceOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the fraction of Note Ons played by each (pitched) General MIDI instrument that is used to play at least one note.
    VariabilityOfNotePrevalenceOfUnpitchedInstrumentsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the fraction of Note Ons played by each (unpitched) MIDI Percussion Key Map instrument that is used to play at least one note.
    VariabilityOfNumberOfIndependentVoicesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of number of different channels in which notes have sounded simultaneously.
    VariabilityOfTimeBetweenAttacksFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the times, in seconds, between Note On events (irregardless of channel).
    VariationOfDynamicsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of loudness levels of all notes.
    VariationOfDynamicsInEachVoiceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average of the standard deviations of loudness levels within each channel that contains at least one note.
    VerticalIntervalsFeature
    Created by dinamix on 6/27/16.
    VibratoPrevalenceFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the number of notes for which Pitch Bend messages change direction at least twice divided by total number of notes that have Pitch Bend messages associated with them.
    ViolinFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to violin patches (General MIDI patches 41 or 111).
    VoiceEqualityDynamicsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the average volume of notes in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityMelodicLeapsFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the average melodic leap in MIDI pitches for each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityNoteDurationFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the total duration of notes in seconds in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityNumberOfNotesFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the total number of Note Ons in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceEqualityRangeFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the differences between the highest and lowest pitches in each channel that contains at least one note.
    VoiceSeparationFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the average separation in semi-tones between the average pitches of consecutive channels (after sorting based on average pitch) that contain at least one note.
    WoodwindsFractionFeature
    A feature exractor that finds the fraction of all Note Ons belonging to woodwind patches (General MIDI patches 69 or 76).
